publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2586 Brian Adam: Winter Maintenance of North East Roads-That the Parliament calls on the Minister for Enterprise, Transport and Lifelong Learning to investigate the performance of BEAR Scotland Ltd and councils in the north east in maintaining roads and pavements in a safe condition during the recent spell of well forecasted adverse weather.
S1M-2586 Winter Maintenance of North East Roads (lodged on 8 January 2002) Stewart Stevenson*, Michael Matheson*
S1M-2586 Winter Maintenance of North East Roads (lodged on 8 January 2002) Nora Radcliffe*

S1M-2586 Brian Adam: Winter Maintenance of North East Roadsâ€”That the Parliament calls on the Minister for Enterprise, Transport and Lifelong Learning to investigate the performance of BEAR Scotland Ltd and councils in the north east in maintaining roads and pavements in a safe condition during the recent spell of well forecasted adverse weather. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson, Michael Matheson, Nora Radcliffe
S1M-2586 Winter Maintenance of North East Roads (lodged on 8 January 2002) Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Tommy Sheridan*
